common.securityNoticeDesc: 1. External wallets are for storage payments; 2. The Identity Layer (Master Password) handles local file encryption and Arweave keys. This separation ensures your data remains private even if your wallet is compromised.
common.unlockRequired: Privacy Layer Locked: Unlock with your Master Password in the Dashboard to enable E2EE and Arweave features.
common.footer: © 2025 Anamnesis — Built with ❤️ for the Permaweb

unlock.title: Unlock Identity Layer
unlock.desc: Unlock your Identity Layer to manage your permaweb records.
unlock.warning: Your password is never sent to any server. It is used locally to derive your encryption keys.
unlock.errorLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
